caption.p: Principal Component Analyses and important loading variables of the phospholipid composition of formula UKB1 and reference materials. Panel ( A), British brand 1 (UKB1) with subgroups that represent the hypothesised (*) dominant lipid source hypothesised marked (Red, cowsâ€™ milk lipids; Green, soya lecithin). ( B), Plot of lipids from skimmed milk powder (SMP) and soya milk with loadings indicating which variables are the most important for distinguishing the two sample types. PC, phosphatidylcholine; PE, phosphatidylethanolamine; PI, phosphatidylinositol. R 2 values for each component are shown in parentheses on each axis.
